hero.title: Building the Future of Intelligent Trading
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to democratize advanced AI trading technology and make it accessible to everyone

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: How Orbitra AI came to be
story.p1: Founded in 2020 by a team of passionate traders and AI engineers, Cylendra was born from a simple observation: traditional trading tools were outdated, complex, and inaccessible to most people.
story.p2: We believed that artificial intelligence could level the playing field, giving everyday traders the same sophisticated tools used by Wall Street hedge funds. After years of research, development, and testing, Orbitra AI was born.
story.p3: Today, we serve thousands of traders across 50+ countries, processing millions of dollars in daily trading volume. Our AI has learned from billions of data points, constantly evolving to adapt to market conditions and deliver consistent results.
story.footer: But we're just getting started. The future of trading is intelligent, automated, and accessible to all.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower traders worldwide with cutting-edge AI technology that makes intelligent, data-driven trading decisions accessible, profitable, and secure for everyoneâ€”from beginners to professionals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's most trusted AI trading platform, where advanced technology meets simplicity, creating a future where anyone can build wealth through intelligent automated trading.
